Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Harlem Reroute near Harlem/Armitage
ShortDescription: Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, North Avenue, Oak Park, Grand, due to street blockage near Harlem/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, North Avenue, Oak Park, Grand  then resume their normal route on Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Armitage.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Grand/Western
ShortDescription: Eastbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Western, Hubbard, Damen then resume their normal route on Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Western, Hubbard, Damen then resume their normal route on Grand due to street blockage near Grand/Western.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st Temporary Reroute at 31st/Lock
ShortDescription: #35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock

Allow extra travel time.
